title: Does PES accept improvement board marks
content: I got CSE in PES but their boards criteria is supposed to be 60% and I donâ€™t think I will be getting that for pcm so what should I do do they accept improvement board examinations

comments.body: Bruh come on man, dont lose hopes.....give ur best.....I heard chem paper was easy and phy ofc u and I both got deep fried....(PS: I gave Boards last yr)......but still dont lose hopes....even in worst case you wont be getting below 60% chill....
u got CSE in rr or ecity?
I hope bro i can just hope now
How can you get 95%+ in JEE but cannot cross 60% in Boards. Wtf?

â€¢Taking boards lightly (one shot before exam night will be sufficient ðŸ¤“ðŸ‘† ill focus on april attempt)

â€¢Physics was messed up for cbse folks past two years (pu only physics mcqs were messed up)

â€¢coaching centres the big ones dont care about boards and only focus on jee Often not even covering derivations and tellin to mug up formulae

Exactly what you said bro 
My coaching centre didnâ€™t focus on my boards and jammed the week between my boards and jee attempt with practicalâ€™s so i had no time to study for boards and regret it big time

But there's a massive difference between 60% and 95%. Someone who scores a 60% lacks the most basic fundamentals. If you can cross 95% you definitely have atleast those clear. IMO you're simply underestimating yourself.
U got CSE in ec campus?
For 95%tile u barely need 100/300 (depends on difficulty too). And that's quite easy.
